meanings.definition: A red powder or cream used as a cosmetic for coloring the cheeks or lips.
meanings.sent1: She applied rouges to her cheeks before going out.
meanings.sent2: The makeup artist used rouges to give her a rosy glow.
meanings.sent3: The little girl got into her mother's makeup and ended up with rouges all over her face.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with rouges of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The artist's palette held a variety of rouges for different skin tones.

meanings.definition: A dishonest or unprincipled person, especially a man.
meanings.sent1: Beware of rouges who try to scam you.
meanings.sent2: The town was wary of the new stranger, fearing he might be a rouge.
meanings.sent3: The movie villain was portrayed as a charming rouge who deceived everyone.
meanings.sent4: The political candidate turned out to be a rouge, betraying the trust of his supporters.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the cunning fox was depicted as a sly rouge.

meanings.sent1: She rouges her cheeks lightly for a natural look.
meanings.sent2: The actress rouges her lips before going on stage.
meanings.sent3: The clown playfully rouges his nose to entertain the children.
meanings.sent4: The artist carefully rouges the cheeks of the portrait to add a touch of color.
meanings.sent5: The dancer rouges her face to enhance her stage presence.

meanings.sent1: He rouges unsuspecting customers by selling fake products.
meanings.sent2: The con artist rouges people out of their hard-earned money.
meanings.sent3: The magician rouges the audience with his clever tricks.
meanings.sent4: The scammer rouges his way into gaining people's trust before deceiving them.
meanings.sent5: The fraudster rouges his business partners by manipulating financial records.
